title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local LLM runner with a built-in model library (Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma, …) and a simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, fluent API, Spring starter included.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI companion for chatting, managing models and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama + Chroma.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot front-end for Ollama with Markdown support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; strongly typed, async tokio client.

title: ollama-nuxt
summary: Nuxt 3 module that auto-injects Ollama client and server utils.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-kt
summary: Kotlin multiplatform HTTP client for Ollama (JVM + Android).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Multi-arch Docker image (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered AI commands inside notes.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs (Go, Ruby, PHP, Dart, etc.).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers via Ollama with slash commands.
